### alignment
### 对齐（alignment）
### alignment
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Often, when you get a document to translate, you receive a set of previously translated documents along with it, or you can find matching pages on websites.
一般你收到一份要翻译的文件时，你还会收到很多之前翻译过的文件和对应的原文，或者你在网络上能找到匹配的内容。
Often, when you get a document to translate, you receive a set of previously translated documents along with it, or you can find matching pages on websites.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Those may contain a whole lot of translations you could use either as TM matches or through concordancing.
这些文件内容很大程度可以用作翻译记忆使用，在模糊匹配和检索时发挥作用。
Those may contain a whole lot of translations you could use either as TM matches or through concordancing.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Problem is, the TM needs segments, and you have whole documents.
问题是，翻译记忆是对齐了的句段，而你现在有的是整个文档。
Problem is, the TM needs segments, and you have whole documents.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Alignment means splitting source and target documents into segments, and algorithmically finding out which target segment corresponds to which source segment.
对齐指将源文档和目标文档拆分成片段，并利用算法找出目标片段对应于哪个源文片段。
Alignment means splitting source and target documents into segments, and algorithmically finding out which target segment corresponds to which source segment.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Not a straightforward thing to do!
这可不是一件简单的事！
Not a straightforward thing to do!
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Advanced CAT tools have a function to automate the bulk of the work and help you correct the rest.
高级CAT软件可以做到大致的句段自动对齐，并帮助你修正对齐错误的句段。
Advanced CAT tools have a function to automate the bulk of the work and help you correct the rest.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
See also: LiveAlign
另见：LiveAlign
See also: LiveAlign

### analysis
### 分析（analysis）
### analysis
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Before you accept a job, you need to know how much text there is to translate.
在你接受一份任务前，你需要知道有多少文本需要翻译。
Before you accept a job, you need to know how much text there is to translate.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
But you already have TMs with past translations, so you also want to know how much new text there is, and how many fuzzy or exact matches you can expect.
但是你已经有了包含过去翻译的翻译记忆，所以您还想知道有多少新的文本需要翻译，有多少模糊匹配和精确匹配。
But you already have TMs with past translations, so you also want to know how much new text there is, and how many fuzzy or exact matches you can expect.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
That's what analysis does: it compares your text against your TMs and corpora, and gives you a neat breakdown expressed in segment, word and character counts.
这就是分析所做的：它对要翻译的文本和翻译记忆与语料库中的文本进行比对，并给你一个清晰的统计结果，包括句段、词和字符数。
That's what analysis does: it compares your text against your TMs and corpora, and gives you a neat breakdown expressed in segment, word and character counts.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
Analysis is sometimes used interchangeably with statistics, which has absolutely no fancy scientific meaning in this context.
“分析”有时也可以和“统计”这个词互换使用，在这种情况下，统计并不是一门高深的学科。
Analysis is sometimes used interchangeably with statistics, which has absolutely no fancy scientific meaning in this context.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
### API; application programming interface
### 应用程序编程接口（API）
### API; application programming interface
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
A nerdy term to say that a program allows other programs to use its functions, just as if a human was clicking its buttons.
一个计算机术语，指一个程序允许其它程序通过某种方式使用它的功能，就像用户通过点击按钮来使用程序。
A nerdy term to say that a program allows other programs to use its functions, just as if a human was clicking its buttons.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
If a program has no API, then it's impossible to integrate it with other systems, and humans end up with tendonitis from lots of completely unnecessary clicking.
如果一个程序没有API，那么它就不能与其它系统集成，用户最终会因为大量完全不必要的点击而患上肌腱炎。
If a program has no API, then it's impossible to integrate it with other systems, and humans end up with tendonitis from lots of completely unnecessary clicking.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
It is particularly important to make sure a cloud-based tool you're considering has an API.
确保你考虑的基于云的工具提供API，这一点尤为重要。
It is particularly important to make sure a cloud-based tool you're considering has an API.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
If it does not, you may get locked in, with no easy way to retrieve your data if you want to switch.
如果不提供，你就没有获得你的数据并和其它程序进行数据交换的简便方法。
If it does not, you may get locked in, with no easy way to retrieve your data if you want to switch.
The ultimate CAT tool jargon buster.md.txt
